column4: hi! I have just installed kubuntu hoary in vmware on windows and want to connect to it via XDMPC via Xming. I can ping the VM, but when I tell Xming to connect it fails.
i know nothing about those two programs... but vmware i know a bit about ... if you can ping the vmware machine then one of the other two programs would most likely be the problem
go with x11vnc if you ask me... its great
